definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The soldier said nothing and Mr White asked him again, 'What do I do now?'
sentences.chinese: 军人一语不发，怀特又问他，“现在我做什么？”

sentences.english: There, at the edge of town, he released me. And without another word, he turned back toward the town.
sentences.chinese: 在小镇边，他放了我，又一语不发地转身走向小镇。

sentences.english: Staring at the rude bartender, she was speechless.
sentences.chinese: 她盯着那个粗鲁的酒吧侍者，一语不发。

sentences.english: Wordlessly, she rises from the couch .
sentences.chinese: 她一语不发，从长沙发椅上站了起来。

sentences.english: Do you say nothing to the grieving parent?
sentences.chinese: 你会对那悲伤的父母一语不发吗？

sentences.english: Capital punishment, under a language teacher north king not hair.
sentences.chinese: 极刑之下，王师北一语不发。

definition: to not say a word (idiom)/to keep silent
to have a taut face/to pull a long face/to look displeased
